issue.title: [CF 907] Error during combat
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Randomly occurs during combat
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Sometimes the error grabber just notifies me of the error, sometimes wow freezes and has to be force closed.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Error occured in: AddOn: TellMeWhen
Count: 1
Message: Note: AddOn TellMeWhen attempted to call a protected function (OverrideActionBarButton4:Show()) during combat lockdown.
Debug:
   [C]: Show()
   ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:268: ActionButton_Update()
   ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:523: ActionButton_OnEvent()
   ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:124:
      ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:117

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Maven79 | Imported from CurseForge issue #907 | Raw

comments.body:
This is an issue Blizzard's bugged taint catcher, not with TellMeWhen.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
